summary.p: Converts a given value to an 8-bit unsigned integer.

examples.p: The following shows TO_BYTE results for some input data:
examples.sampleCode: SELECT 'The TO_BYTE result of value ''0'' is: ' AS Input, TO_BYTE('0') AS Value UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_BYTE result of value ''1'' is: ', TO_BYTE('1') UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_BYTE result of value ''255'' is: ', TO_BYTE('255')
